body_html:
@GedisJ For now I am working on migrating the gradients from Python to C++ because one Operation without gradient in the graph means an untrainable network.
Because the node ​ApplyAdam already exists I think that adding Adam is not that hard. I'll take a look and keep you updated.

body:
@GedisJ For now I am working on migrating the gradients from Python to C++ because one Operation without gradient in the graph means an untrainable network.
Because the node `​ApplyAdam` already exists I think that adding Adam is not that hard. I'll take a look and keep you updated.
